welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Torrelodones! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of this quaint Spanish city, known for its stunning natural scenery and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Torrelodones has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: An extension of Terminal 4, mainly used for long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.
